titles.title: A joint resolution to approve the request of the President for additional assistance for Central American democracies under section 215(2) of P. L. 99-500.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.
Senate Committee on Appropriations discharged. Pursuant to the provisions of Public Law 99-500.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 64.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/6/1987--Introduced. Grants congressional approval of additional economic assistance for the Central American democracies that the President requested pursuant to the Military Construction Appropriations Act, 1987.
